steps.message: Swipe left or right across the screen to move between nearby rooms.
Watch the minimap highlight to see which exits are open.
Tap a character's name to open their interaction menu.
Choose Talk to hear what they have to say and advance the story.
Jed will highlight the parts you need. Drag them into the slots when they flash yellow.
Watch the stability meter. Tap the reinforce button before it dips into the red zone.
The pan scorched. Release while the cursor is inside the gold zone.
Watch the bar settle before tapping again.
That bandage slipped. Hold until the pulse enters the green window.
It is still dark inside Nova's house. Tap the "Light Switch" hotspot to power the room lights.
Once the lights are on you'll see every hotspot and can continue exploring.
Swipe across the screen to travel between rooms.
Use the glowing minimap indicators to confirm which exits are unlocked.
The fish wriggled free. Reel when the indicator crosses the green band.
Nice catch! Try for a perfect by landing in the gold band.
The marker glides automatically. Tap anywhere when it enters the green band to hook a fish.
Release if the marker hits red to avoid snapping the line.
That surge knocked out every light. Check the breaker panel near the door and figure out why it's still dark.
Ollie stashed a spare fuse in your storage trunk. Grab it before you try flipping the switch again.
Tap the breaker panel to inspect it. Look for the scorched fuse slot highlighted in yellow.
Open your storage trunk beside the bed to dig out the backup fuse.
Items you recover show up in your bag - double-check the backup fuse is there before heading back to the breaker.
With the spare fuse in hand, inspect the breaker and choose Install Fuse to seat it.
Once the breaker hums back to life, flip the light switch to finish the repair.
Tyson waves you over. Tap the "Talk to Tyson" prompt inside his stall to hear what he needs.
He'll explain where the ration crate is stashed once you check in.
Grab the ration pack from the crate in the back room. It's marked with a glowing icon.
Anything you pick up automatically drops into your bag so you can deliver it without fiddling in menus.
Ollie is waiting near the plaza fountain. Tap his prompt to hand over the ration pack.
He won't stop lecturing you about nutrition until he gets his snack, so get moving.
Jed wants to review the busted gear. Talk to him inside Scrap & Salvage to get the rundown.
He'll hand you parts and push you toward the bench once you're caught up.
Tap the Tinkering Table prompt to lay out the repairs when Jed calls you over.
Watch for highlighted sockets and follow Jed's cues before you start welding.
Slot the components Jed hands you, then press Craft to seal the first repair.
Keep an eye on the stability meter—reinforce if it dips into the red.
Once the tutorial wraps, close the bench and talk to Jed to hand the repairs back.
He'll debrief you and queue up the next deliveries.
Ollie is tagging along as your in-universe guide. When an ally joins, their portrait appears near your HUD.
Tap their portrait anytime to swap party members or hear their latest tip.
Head south to the market strip. Look for Jed's scrap stall glowing in yellow on the minimap.
Tap highlighted doorways to enter new stalls—Jed's is just east of the plaza.
Open your journal from the HUD to track active errands. The highlighted quest is pinned on your minimap.
Use the journal tabs to review ally requests and hub summaries as they unlock.
Swipe up from the bottom tray or tap the backpack icon to open your bag at any time.
Use the filters along the left edge to jump between gear, consumables, and key items. Long-press any entry for more details.
